CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 负债；欠款；欠；欠情；应归功于；归因于；应感激；应给予；有义务；应当做某事；应承担责任；（对位高权重者）忠诚；服从；起源于

synonym.mean: 欠；感激；应给予；应该把……归功于

word_group.brief_definition: 为了自己有必要做某事
为了自己有必要做某事
word_group.phrase: owe it to oneself to do something

bilingual.source: I owe a lot to wife and children.
bilingual.target: 我很感激我的寝子和孩子。

bilingual.source: I owe those guys a great deal of gratitude.
Molly: Thanks a bunch, I owe you one.
I owe you more than I can convey in words.
bilingual.target: 我无以表达自己对你的感激之情。

bilingual.source: We owe a lot to the birds and beasts who eat insects.
bilingual.target: 我们十分感激食虫的飞禽和走兽.

bilingual.source: If the race that we belong to owes anything to any human being, or to any power in the universe, they owe it to these black men.
bilingual.target: 如果说我们所属的种族对任何人、对宇宙间任何力量应该有所感激的话， 应感激的就是黑人。

bilingual.source: I owe them so much, and they have helped make this challenge a lot easier for me so far.
bilingual.target: 我对他们很感激，在他们的帮助下我的这场挑战才变得容易一些。

bilingual.source: “How much do we owe you, monsieur?” I asked.
bilingual.target: “我们欠您多少钱，先生？”我问道。

bilingual.source: "How much do I owe you?" she asked me, reaching for her purse.
bilingual.target: “我欠你多少钱？”她问我，伸手去拿钱包。

list.abstract: owe（英 [əʊ]，美 [oʊ]），英语单词，作动词时，为欠；欠… 东西；应该给予。短语搭配有owing to（由于）。例句为“I owe my life to you.（我应该感谢你救了我的命。）” owe动词类近义词有appreciate、be grateful to。
OWE（ORIENTAL WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT 东方职业摔角联盟）是由上海上武兴文体育文化发展有限公司全资打造的国际职业摔角品牌，是一个是职业摔角比赛与网络偶像育成体系相结合的全新产品，属于中国人自己的职业摔角联盟。2017年，于上海横空出世！力求打造全球娱乐体育新偶像，也必将使OWE成为世界娱乐体育界的MVP！

yingyinNormal.en: I owe you. It's okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我欠你条命。这没什么。

yingyinNormal.en: I owe them much more than that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我欠他们不止这些。

yingyinNormal.en: But I do not owe you a kindness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我没必要这样便宜你的。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. And now I owe you one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，现在我把没帮你撕的补上。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Ross, I'm aware of what I owe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，我知道我欠多少。

yingyinNormal.en: We all chipped in. We did? You owe me $20.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大伙凑的。大伙？你欠我20块。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't owe this world a thing. You never did.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不欠这个世界什么，从来都不。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Pheebs. Hey. Here. Now I only owe you $49.50.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比。嘿。给你，现在我欠你49块半。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't owe me anything, I don't want you money…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不要你的…

yingyinNormal.en: No-no-no, please, please, Chandler I would owe you so much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，求求你，就当我欠你的。

yingyinNormal.en: You owe me, kid. You owe me. You owe me. Slow down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你欠我的，孩子欠我的，欠我的。说慢点。

yingyinNormal.en: You do owe me so much. You owe me three thousand, four hundred…
yingyinNormal.zh: 你本来就欠我的，你欠我3千4百…

yingyinNormal.en: All right. All right. Phoebe I will let you have him, but you owe me, you owe me big.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，好吧，我把他让给你，但你欠我一个大人情。

yingyinNormal.en: Please don't make me. Please don't make me to tell them on my own. You owe me that much. You owe them that much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别留下我独自面对他们，你欠我 欠他们那么多。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Give me a number, I don't want to owe you anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？我不想欠你。你不欠我。

yingyinNormal.en: I owe her more than I can possibly fathom. And she owes me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我欠她太多，多到我无法想象。而她也欠我。

yingyinNormal.en: We're already two months behind. Next week we'll owe three months.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们已经两个月没付，下星期就欠三个月了。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe you thought I was cheating. You owe me an apology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不敢相信你认为我会有外遇，你要对我道歉。

yingyinNormal.en: Sweetheart, your father and I think we owe you an apology. For what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 宝贝，你爸爸和我觉得该跟你道歉。为了什么？

yingyinNormal.en: The game, Rachel, the game. You owe us money for the game. Oh. Right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，是赌局，你欠我们钱。哦，好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 欠；欠… 东西；应该给予；应把…归功于；因…而感激

examination_example.sentence: It is indicated in Paragraph 3 that train operators have suffered huge losses <highlight>owing</highlight> to the strikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第3段指出，列车经营者因罢工而蒙受巨大损失。

examination_example.sentence: Monarchs are kept as head of state in Europe mostly <highlight>owing</highlight> to their undoubted and respectable status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 君主在欧洲被保留为国家元首，主要是因为他们无可置疑和受人尊敬的地位。

examination_example.sentence: Its current leader, Ed Miliband, <highlight>owes</highlight> his position to votes from public-sector unions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其现任领导人Ed Miliband的职位归功于公共部门工会的投票。

examination_example.sentence: If they weren't charged it, most didn't realize they <highlight>owed</highlight> it and few paid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们没有被征收的话，大部分不会意识到他们欠税了，并且也没有几个人会缴税。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 欠；欠… 东西；应该给予；应把…归功于；因…而感激

sense_info_list.en: be indebted to, in an abstract or intellectual sense

examination_example.sentence: Reverse its conservation plan <highlight>owing</highlight> to criticisms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因批评而取消其保育计划。

examination_example.sentence: Even school pupils can have their CubeSats put in orbit <highlight>owing</highlight> to the lowered launching cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于发射成本降低，甚至小学生也可以将立方体卫星送入轨道。

examination_example.sentence: Coal prices also are low, <highlight>owing</highlight> to over-supply and the scaling-down of demand, especially from China, which bums half of the world's coal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 煤炭价格也处于低位，原因是供应过剩和需求减少，尤其是来自中国的需求，中国的煤炭消耗量占世界煤炭总量的一半。

sense_info_list.en: be obliged to pay or repay; be in debt

examination_example.sentence: As a result of that they feel they're <highlight>owed</highlight> and their inflated sense of self-worth, they don't work as hard for their employer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于他们觉得自己被亏欠了，自我价值感膨胀，他们不会像以前那样为雇主努力工作。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, they lied about the number of miles, even though they would forfeit money they were <highlight>owed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，他们谎报了里程数，即使他们会丧失本应得到的钱。

word_family.mean: v. 欠；欠… 东西；应该给予；应把…归功于；因…而感激

sense_info_list.en: be indebted to; in an abstract or intellectual sense

examination_example.sentence: What does the company Procter & Gamble <highlight>owe</highlight> its success to?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宝洁公司的成功归功于什么？

direction_info.description:
